sentence.Network_cn: 巴黎是他们的地盘：那里熟悉的大街、剧院、住宅和公园。

derivation.yuyuan_name: Old English, of Germanic origin; related to Dutch turf and German Torf, from an Indo-European root shared by Sanskrit darbha 'tuft of grass'

encyclopedia.content: turf英音：[tə:f]美音：[tɝf]名词 n. 1. 草皮，草根土[U] The gardener was busy laying turf. 园丁正忙于铺草皮。 2. 草皮块[C] We have ordered several turfs to make our lawn. 我们订购了一些草皮块铺个草坪。 Mr. Brown bought some turfs to repair the lawn in his front yard. 布朗先生买了一些草皮块来修补他家前院的草坪。 3. 泥炭，泥煤[C] 4. 【美】【俚】地盘；势力范围[the S] They considered

entry.def: Turf is short, thick, even grass.

example.ex: They shuffled slowly down the turf towards the cliff's edge.
example.tran: 他们拖着脚步沿着草皮慢慢地走向悬崖边。

entry.def: A turf is a small rectangular piece of grass which you lay on the ground in order to make a lawn.

example.ex: Lift the turfs carefully — they can be reused elsewhere.
example.tran: 抬草皮时小心点——它们还能在别处重新利用。

entry.def: Someone's turf is the area which is most familiar to them or where they feel most confident.

example.ex: Their turf was Paris: its streets, theaters, homes, and parks...
example.tran: 巴黎是他们的地盘：那里熟悉的大街、剧院、住宅和公园。

example.ex: On its home turf, the combined bank would be unrivalled.
example.tran: 那家联合银行在它自己的地盘上就无可匹敌了。

means.word_mean: 1. surface layer of ground containing a matt of grass and grass roots
2. the territory claimed by a juvenile gang as its own

sentences.sentence: "a bureaucracy...chiefly concerned with turf...and protecting the retirement system"

means.word_mean: 1. cover (the ground) with a surface layer of grass or grass roots

auth_sentence.content: Others are already fighting their wars on his turf.

auth_sentence.res_content: They forage for seeds and roots in the thin turf.

sentences.en: laying turf to create a lawn
primitive cottages made of sods of turf and sticks
sentences.cn: 由草皮和木条搭建的原始村舍

sentences.en: They still cut turf here for fuel.
sentences.cn: 在这里他们仍然割草皮作燃料。

means.word_mean: 草皮块(通常为正方形或长方形)

sentences.en: We have ordered several turfs to make our lawn.
sentences.cn: 我们订购了一些草皮块铺个草坪。

sentences.en: the team’s first success of the season on home turf
sentences.cn: 这个队在主场赢得的本赛季第一场胜利

sentences.en: History shows that New Zealand are almost unbeatable by British teams on their own turf.
sentences.cn: 以往的记录表明新西兰队在主场赛马中几乎从来没有输给英国队。

sentences.en: Street violence has escalated as a result of a turf war between rival neighbourhood gangs.
sentences.cn: 两个地段流氓团伙之间因地盘之争引发街头暴力升级。

sentences.en: Turf wars are inevitable when two departments are merged.
sentences.cn: 两个部门合并时总免不了争争权限。

sentences.en: It will be good if that part of the garden is turfed.
sentences.cn: 要是那片园地铺上草皮,那是很好的。

means.word_mean: 把…赶出，驱逐出(地方、组织等)

sentences.en: We need to turf the Democratic party out.
sentences.cn: 我们应该把民主党赶走。

sentences.en: Several families have been turfed out of their homes.
sentences.cn: 有几家人被逐出了家园。

sentences.en: The boys should have been turfed off the bus.
sentences.cn: 这些男孩原本应该被赶下公共汽车的。

means.word_mean: 丟弃，扔掉(不需要的东西)

sentences.en: The shop is full of beautiful clothes that people have turfed out.
sentences.cn: 这家商店里面全是人们处理掉的漂亮衣服。
